name: saoke_huydong_raw
description: This table contains raw data of financial transactions, including account details, interest rates, and client information.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction was processed.

columns.name: nhom_cn
columns.description: The code representing the group or category of the transaction.

columns.name: cn
columns.description: The code identifying the branch or center where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: ten_cn
columns.description: The name of the branch or center where the transaction occurred.

columns.name: ma_loai
columns.description: The code representing the type of transaction.

columns.name: thi_truong
columns.description: The market or marketplace associated with the transaction.

columns.name: thanhphan_kinhte
columns.description: The economic component or sector involved in the transaction.

columns.name: acct_no
columns.description: The account number associated with the transaction.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period over which the transaction is relevant.

columns.name: period_type
columns.description: The classification or type of the period.

columns.name: gl_code
columns.description: The general ledger code associated with the transaction.

columns.name: loai_tien
columns.description: The type of currency used in the transaction.

columns.name: tk2
columns.description: A secondary account associated with the transaction.

columns.name: tk3
columns.description: A tertiary account associated with the transaction.

columns.name: tk_nhnn
columns.description: The account with the central bank related to the transaction.

columns.name: laisuat
columns.description: The interest rate applied to the transaction.

columns.name: tienlai_duchi
columns.description: The amount of interest that is due but not yet paid.

columns.name: tienlai_thucchi
columns.description: The amount of interest that has been paid.

columns.name: kyhan_loaitien
columns.description: The term associated with the currency of the transaction.

columns.name: loai_kyhan
columns.description: The type of term or duration for the transaction.

columns.name: kyhan_so
columns.description: The specific number of the term or duration.

columns.name: laisuat_dcv
columns.description: The interest rate for the DCV (Discounted Cash Value).

columns.name: tien_denhan
columns.description: The amount due upon maturity of the transaction.

columns.name: ngay_daohan
columns.description: The date when the transaction matures.

columns.name: songay_conlai
columns.description: The number of days remaining until maturity.

columns.name: client_no
columns.description: The unique identifier for the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: client_name
columns.description: The name of the client involved in the transaction.

columns.name: ngay_moso_datetime
columns.description: The date and time when the account was opened.

columns.name: ngay_moso
columns.description: The date when the account was opened.

columns.name: acct_type
columns.description: The type of account involved in the transaction.

columns.name: acct_type_desc
columns.description: A description of the type of account.

columns.name: ma_nguoiquanly
columns.description: The code identifying the manager responsible for the account.

columns.name: ten_nguoiquanly
columns.description: The name of the manager responsible for the account.

columns.name: client_type
columns.description: The classification or type of client.

columns.name: profit_centre
columns.description: The profit center associated with the transaction.

columns.name: sodu
columns.description: The balance of the account.

columns.name: sodu_qd
columns.description: The adjusted or qualified balance of the account.

columns.name: ngaymo_cif
columns.description: The date when the CIF (Customer Information File) was opened.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state or province associated with the transaction.

columns.name: country
columns.description: The country associated with the transaction.

columns.name: class_5
columns.description: A classification category for the transaction.

columns.name: industry
columns.description: The industry or sector associated with the transaction.

columns.name: business
columns.description: The business or enterprise involved in the transaction.

columns.name: major_category
columns.description: The primary category for the transaction.

columns.name: cmnd_mst
columns.description: The identification number or tax ID associated with the transaction.

columns.name: registered_branch
columns.description: The branch where the transaction is registered.

columns.name: registered_date
columns.description: The date when the transaction was registered.

columns.name: registered_state
columns.description: The state where the transaction is registered.

columns.name: registered_state_desc
columns.description: A description of the state where the transaction is registered.

columns.name: ngay_taituc
columns.description: The date when the transaction was renewed or extended.

columns.name: date_sync_date
columns.description: The date when the data was synchronized.

columns.name: closing_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was closed.

columns.name: ngay_tattoan
columns.description: The date when the transaction was settled or closed.
